story.title: My Story
paragraphs: I've been building websites for over 5 years, working with clients ranging from solo entrepreneurs to growing businesses. My journey started with a simple curiosity about how websites work, and grew into a passion for creating digital experiences that make a real difference.

What drives me isn't just writing code—it's seeing the impact a well-crafted website has on someone's business. There's nothing quite like launching a project and watching it help a client reach new customers, streamline their work, or finally have that professional online presence they've been dreaming of.

I believe in doing things right, even when no one's watching. That means clean code, thoughtful design decisions, and always putting the user experience first. Every project is an opportunity to create something meaningful.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: What you need to know before starting a project

items.question: What materials do I need to provide?
items.answer: At minimum, you'll need Figma design files (or link) and a PRD (product requirements document). Without finalized designs, I won't be able to start work. API documentation and brand guidelines are helpful if available.

items.question: Can you work without designs?
items.answer: I specialize in design implementation, so finalized designs are required. If you don't have designs yet, please work with a designer first and reach out when ready. I can recommend designers if needed.

items.question: What design formats do you support?
items.answer: Figma is strongly preferred. I can also work with Sketch and Adobe XD files, but Figma allows for the most efficient workflow. PSD or image files alone won't allow for accurate implementation.

items.question: How detailed should the PRD be?
items.answer: The more detailed, the better. Include all interactions, state changes, and error handling. Any unclear areas will require clarification before development, which may delay the timeline.

items.question: How do you calculate quotes?
items.answer: Quotes are based on design complexity, number of pages, interaction requirements, and feature specifications. I provide accurate quotes after reviewing your Figma and PRD. Landing pages start at $1,500, web apps at $5,000.

items.question: What technologies do you use?
items.answer: I primarily use React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. I'll recommend the optimal tech stack based on your project requirements.

items.question: Is responsive included by default?
items.answer: Yes, all projects include responsive implementation. However, your designs must include mobile/tablet versions. Desktop-only designs will limit responsive implementation.

items.question: What if the implementation differs from the design?
items.answer: I aim for pixel-perfect implementation. If you spot any deviations during weekly demos, flag them immediately. Revisions within the original design scope are included at no extra cost.

items.question: Can I change designs during development?
items.answer: Design changes after development starts will incur additional costs and timeline delays. I strongly recommend finalizing designs before starting development.

items.question: Do you handle deployment?
items.answer: Yes, I deploy to your preferred environment — Vercel, Netlify, AWS, etc. Hosting setup and domain configuration assistance is included.
